name: Cube
description: A cube has six equal sides, 12 equal edges, and 8 corners. Each of its sides are a square.

name: Rectangular Prism
description: A rectangular prism has six sides that are rectangles. It has a rectangular base. It has the same cross section along its length making it a prism.

name: Triangular Prism
description: A triangular prism has three rectangular sides, and two triangular bases. It has five sides in total.

name: Hexagonal Prism
description: A hexagonal prism has 8 faces, 18 edges, and 12 corners. Its bases are hexagons, meaning it has 6 faces which are rectangles.

name: Square Pyramid
description: A square pyramid has a square base and four triangles faces. The triangles are connected to the base and form a point.

name: Rect. Pyramid
description: A rectangular pyramid has 5 sides. It has a rectangular base and four triangles faces. The triangles are connected to the base and form a point.

name: Triangular Pyramid
description: A triangular pyramid has 4 sides. It has a triangle base and three triangles faces.

name: Hexagonal Pyramid
description: A hexagonal pyramid has 7 sides. It has a hexagon base and six triangles faces.

name: Cylinder
description: A cylinder has three faces. It is made of two circles and a rectangle. It is a prism with circle bases.

name: Cone
description: A cone has two faces. It can be thought of as a circle based pyramid. A cone has a flat base and a pointed tip.

name: Sphere
description: A sphere has one side. It is perfectly round. It is defined as a set of points that are equal distance from a given point.

name: Torus
description: A torus has one side. It is made by rotating a circle around a fixed point. It looks like a ring or donut.

name: Octahedron
description: An octahedron has eight sides. It is made by connecting eight equal sized triangles.

name: Ellipsoid
description: An ellipsoid has one side. It is made by deforming a sphere by stretching it in a direction.

name: Hemisphere
description: An hemisphere has two sides. It is made by dividing a sphere in half.
